/* =============================================================================================================================================================
-- Server		: LOCAL SERVER
-- Database		: USER DATABASE
-- Script		: GetTableColumnDetails
-- Description	: Get Details of Columns Along with DataTypes and Properities
-- **Note		: Refer "sys.columns LEFT JOIN sys.types" for More Details
============================================================================================================================================================= */
DECLARE @SCHname VARCHAR(128) = '$SchName$'; --Optional
DECLARE @TBLname VARCHAR(128) = '$TblName$'; --Optional
--
/* ===== ** DO NOT CHANGE CODE BELOW FROM HERE ** =========================================================================================================== */
SET NOCOUNT ON;
SET @SCHname = LTRIM(RTRIM(@SCHname)); IF @SCHname = '' SET @SCHname = NULL; --Trimming and Resetting Value
SET @TBLname = LTRIM(RTRIM(@TBLname)); IF @TBLname = '' SET @TBLname = NULL; --Trimming and Resetting Value
--
SELECT SCH.name AS "SchemaName",
	   TBL.name AS "TableName",
	   COL.column_id AS "ColID",
	   COL.name AS "ColumnName",
	   /*COL.user_type_id, COL.system_type_id,*/
	   CASE WHEN COL.user_type_id <> COL.system_type_id THEN TYPE_NAME(COL.user_type_id) ELSE '' END AS "UserDataType",
	   ISNULL(TYPE_NAME(COL.system_type_id), TYPE_NAME(COL.user_type_id)) AS "SystemDataType",
	   COL.max_length AS "MaxLength", --This Value Applies Only for DataTypes IN ( 'varbinary', 'varchar', 'binary', 'char', 'nvarchar', 'nchar' )
	   COL.precision AS "Precision", --This Value Applies Only for DataTypes IN ( 'decimal', 'numeric' )
	   COL.scale AS "Scale", --This Value Applies Only for DataTypes IN ( 'decimal', 'numeric' )
	   COALESCE(TYPE_NAME(COL.system_type_id)
					+ CASE
						 WHEN TYPE_NAME(COL.system_type_id) IN ( 'decimal', 'numeric' ) THEN '(' + CAST(COL.precision AS VARCHAR(4)) + ', ' + CAST(COL.scale AS VARCHAR(4)) + ')'
						 WHEN COL.max_length = -1 AND TYPE_NAME(COL.system_type_id) NOT IN ( 'xml' ) THEN '(max)'
						 WHEN TYPE_NAME(COL.system_type_id) IN ( 'nvarchar', 'nchar' ) THEN '(' + CAST(COL.max_length / 2 AS VARCHAR(5)) + ')'
						 WHEN TYPE_NAME(COL.system_type_id) IN ( 'varchar', 'char', 'varbinary', 'binary' ) THEN '(' + CAST(COL.max_length AS VARCHAR(5)) + ')'
						 ELSE '' --FOR{image|text|uniqueidentifier|date|time|datetime2|datetimeoffset|tinyint|smallint|int|smalldatetime|real|money|datetime|float|sql_variant|ntext|bit|smallmoney|bigint|timestamp|xml|hierarchyid|geography|geometry}
					  END,
				 CASE WHEN COL.user_type_id <> COL.system_type_id AND TYPE_NAME(COL.system_type_id) IS NULL THEN TYPE_NAME(COL.user_type_id) ELSE NULL END) AS "ConfiguredSystemType",
	   ISNULL(PKC.Is_PK, 0) AS "Is_Primary",
	   COL.is_identity AS "Is_Identity",
	   COL.is_computed AS "Is_Computed",
	   CASE WHEN COL.is_computed = 1 THEN CC.definition ELSE N'' END AS "ComputedColumn_Definition"
FROM sys.columns AS COL
INNER JOIN sys.tables AS TBL ON TBL.object_id = COL.object_id
INNER JOIN sys.schemas AS SCH ON SCH.schema_id = TBL.schema_id
LEFT JOIN (
			  SELECT IC.object_id, IC.column_id, 1 AS "Is_PK"
			  FROM sys.index_columns AS IC
			  INNER JOIN sys.key_constraints AS KC ON IC.object_id = KC.parent_object_id
					 AND IC.index_id = KC.unique_index_id AND KC.type = 'PK'
		  ) AS PKC ON PKC.object_id = COL.object_id AND PKC.column_id = COL.column_id
LEFT JOIN sys.computed_columns AS CC ON CC.object_id = TBL.object_id AND CC.column_id = COL.column_id
WHERE 1 = 1
	AND (SCH.name = @SCHname OR @SCHname IS NULL)
	AND (TBL.name = @TBLname OR @TBLname IS NULL)
ORDER BY SCH.name ASC, TBL.name ASC, COL.column_id ASC;
